synopsis: A new, smaller and more capable weapon is mobilized against the New Dominion Tank Police.

title.jp: Charles Brenten, Master Detective!! ~ Black Rain of Newport! ~

synopsis: Leona is fed up with the chief being so restrictive so she requests a leave of absence.
A Dainippon Giken Research Agency truck rolls right through the New Dominion Tank Police's defenses.
A white fog blankets the city, causing the New DominionTank Police to become disoriented.
The New Dominion Tank Police units are spread thin as they respond to crime that is raging on all throughout the city.
With the Mayor injured and the pending charges against the executives from the Dainippon Giken Research Agency, Rockford Enterprises is looking to take over.
